upgrades.name: Wireless Mouse
upgrades.desc: Breaking free of a wire, this mouse allows maximum freedom of movement. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Additional Mouse Buttons
upgrades.desc: More buttons allow for multiple functionalities, increasing productivity with every click. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Increased DPI
upgrades.desc: Moving from 400 DPI to 30,000 increases accuracy and sensitivity, doubling your point generation potential. Cursors are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Ergonomic Trading Mouse
upgrades.desc: A mouse designed for optimal comfort during extended crypto trading sessions. Mouse and cursors gain +0.1 points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Turbo Click Script
upgrades.desc: Empowers each click with a massive boost, amplifying point generation based on your assets. Mouse and cursors gain +0.5 points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Crypto-Optimized Button Mapping
upgrades.desc: Allows for rapid point swapping and blockchain operations with specialized button configurations, amplifying point generation. Mouse and cursors gain +5 points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Mechanical Fingers
upgrades.desc: Automated precision fingers that click tirelessly, increasing point accumulation from every non-cursor asset. Mouse and cursors gain +50 points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: AI Predictive Clicking
upgrades.desc: Leveraging advanced AI to anticipate and auto-click optimal points, greatly magnifying the benefit from each non-cursor asset. Mouse and cursors gain +500 points for each non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Nano-Precision Laser Tracking
upgrades.desc: Ensures the cursor operates at subatomic accuracy level, boosting point counts with an exponential factor. Mouse and cursors gain +5.000K points for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Solar Click Cultivator
upgrades.desc: Click on any location in Polygon subspace instantly, substantially increasing point yields. Mouse and cursors gain +50.000K for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Interstellar Clicker
upgrades.desc: Span lightyears with the flick of the wrist. Click across multiple galactic clusters, reaping a colossal point count for each non-cursor asset. Mouse and cursors gain +500.000K for every non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: The Verse Booster
upgrades.desc: Taps into the Verse’s restricted dark energy technology, sundering the fabric of reality with every movement and click, resulting in massive point gains. Mouse and cursors gain +5.000M for each non-cursor asset owned.

upgrades.name: Enhanced ASIC Mining Rigs
upgrades.desc: Upgrades to more efficient ASIC mining rigs to increase transaction processing speed, doubling their efficiency.

upgrades.name: Optimized Proof of Work Algorithm
upgrades.desc: Refines the Proof of Work algorithm to increase transaction validation efficiency while reducing energy consumption. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Improved Mempool Management
upgrades.desc: Enhances the memory pool system for faster and more efficient transaction handling and verification. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Advanced Byzantine Fault Tolerance
upgrades.desc: Implements a deterministic solution to the Byzantine General's Problem, ensuring greater security and consensus accuracy. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Dynamic Block Size Scaling
upgrades.desc: Introduces a flexible block size mechanism to adapt to transaction volume changes, optimizing blockchain scalability. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Atomic Swap Capability
upgrades.desc: Enables direct, cross-chain asset swaps without the need for intermediaries, enhancing interoperability between different blockchains. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Quantum-Proof Encryption Upgrade
upgrades.desc: Upgrades encryption algorithms to protect against quantum computing threats, ensuring blockchain security. Basic blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Subspace Block Broadcasting
upgrades.desc: Implements technology to achieve near-instantaneous block propagation across Polygon’s solar system network, drastically reducing transaction confirmation times. Basic Blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Galactic Consensus AI
upgrades.desc: An advanced artificial intelligence that spans the galaxy, reaching consensus decisions at the speed of thought, integrating the collective intelligence of multiple civilizations.

upgrades.name: Quantum Computing Transaction Validator
upgrades.desc: Implements cutting-edge quantum computing processors that leverage the principle of superposition, allowing the blockchain to simultaneously exist in multiple states. This results in an exponential increase in processing power. Basic Blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Black Hole Data Compression
upgrades.desc: Uses the immense gravitational pull of a black hole to compress and store blockchain data, thus putting a permanent end to the epochal, galaxy-spanning blockspace wars while also achieving near-infinite data scalability. Basic Blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Proof-of-Stake
upgrades.desc: The transition from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake paves the way for higher transactions per section and more energy-efficient transaction validation. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Zero-Knowledge Proof Protocols
upgrades.desc: Implements advanced cryptographic techniques to enable transaction validation without revealing sensitive data, enhancing privacy and security. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Cross-Chain Smart Contract Functionality
upgrades.desc: Enables smart contracts to operate across different blockchain platforms, increasing versatility and interoperability. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: AI-Assisted Contract Auditing
upgrades.desc: Incorporates AI algorithms to audit and optimize smart contracts in real-time, ensuring maximum efficiency and reliability. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Oracles Network Expansion
upgrades.desc: Broadens the range and reliability of external data sources used by smart contracts, increasing their accuracy, functionality, and relevancy. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Quantum-Secure Smart Contracts
upgrades.desc: Upgrades smart contracts to be resistant to quantum computing attacks, future-proofing the blockchain's security. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Self-Optimizing Smart Contracts
upgrades.desc: Smart contracts that automatically update their code for efficiency and security, ensuring high performance and reduced vulnerabilities. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Interplanetary File Storage
upgrades.desc: Utilizes a decentralized file storage system that spans several Polygon planets, ensuring data redundancy and security on an solar scale. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Quantum-Entangled World State
upgrades.desc: The collective, current state of all accounts and smart contracts, including each account's balance, nonce, and storage, as well as the current state of smart contract code propagate changes throughout the network instantaneously. Advanced blockchains are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Sharding Technique
upgrades.desc: Shards the blockchain across multiple dimensions, drastically improving scalability and reducing resource consumption. Advanced Blockchain are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Sentient Smart Contracts
upgrades.desc: Self-aware smart contracts that can think, learn, and evolve. These conscious contracts, which stand in relationship to humans as humans to yeast, can autonomously adapt to changing conditions, negotiate terms, and make decisions to optimize transactions and interactions within the blockchain on a level humans cannot fathom. Advanced Blockchain are twice as efficient.

name: VTS Participant
desc: VERSE Token Sale (VTS) participants are visionary individuals.

upgrades.name: Verse Whitepaper 1.0
upgrades.desc: Studying and understanding the original Verse whitepaper grants a deep insight into the VERSE token's potential. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Telegram
upgrades.desc: The Verse Telegram group's constant flow of lively discussions about all things Verse, increases knowledge about, and certainty of Verse's powerful potential. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Email Subscription
upgrades.desc: Signing up for the Verse email list gives VTS participants the earliest access to all information about the Verse. Staying updated with the latest news and insights, they’re always one step ahead in the Verse community. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Whitelist Spot
upgrades.desc: Reserving their spot on the Verse whitelist pre-confirms VTS participants’’ ability to purchase during the token sale. This early reservation marks them as a proactive and committed member of the Verse community, ready to seize opportunities as they arise. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse AMA Participation
upgrades.desc: Engaging in Ask Me Anything (AMA) sessions with Verse experts expands VTS participants’ understanding and deepens their knowledge about Verse. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Meme Contest
upgrades.desc: Participating in the Verse meme contest not only deepens VTS participants’ ties with fellow community members but also hones their creative and meme-making skills. This fun and engaging activity strengthens their bond with the community and enhances their cultural influence within the Verse ecosystem. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Token Sale Participation
upgrades.desc: Taking part in the live Verse token sale secures VTS participants’ place in history as one of the original Verse token holders. This act of participation is a testament to their foresight and commitment to being a part of the Verse's foundational community. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse-cension
upgrades.desc: After securing their tokens, VTS participants achieve a new level of consciousness, where mundane concerns of daily life seem trivial. This heightened state of being allows them to focus on the bigger picture and the transformative potential of Verse. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Eye of the Verse
upgrades.desc: Deep contemplation and understanding of Verse have opened VTS participants’ third eye, granting them clarity on how the future will unfold with Verse's influence. This visionary insight places them at the forefront of navigating and leveraging the changes that will be brought by Verse. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Emissions Begin
upgrades.desc: Witnessing VTS participants purchased VERSE tokens unlocking block-by-block on chain is the physical manifestation of their patience and foresight. The dream is reality. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Depleted Uranium Hands
upgrades.desc: Refusing to paper-hand dynastic wealth, VTS participants have developed depleted-uranium hands. Their descendants will inherit planets. The very arc of Polygon has irrevocably been changed by VTS participants. VTS participants are twice as efficient.

name: Junior Dev
desc: Beginning to work with Verse technologies.

upgrades.name: Caffeine Tablet Dispenser
upgrades.desc: Equipped with time-release caffeine tablets, Junior Devs maintain heightened focus and energy, tackling Verse coding challenges with renewed vigor. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
upgrades.desc: Drowning out distractions, these headphones enable Junior Devs to dive deep into code, ensuring undisturbed concentration. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Dual Monitor Setup
upgrades.desc: With an extended display, Junior Devs can multi-task and view code more efficiently, enhancing their coding speed and accuracy. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Ergonomic Keyboard
upgrades.desc: Ensuring comfort during long coding sessions, this keyboard reduces strain and elevates coding speed. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Lightweight Integrated Developer Environment
upgrades.desc: A streamlined coding environment ensures that Junior Devs have all the necessary tools at their fingertips. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Hackathon Experience
upgrades.desc: Armed with the adrenaline and lessons of coding marathons, Junior Devs tackle challenges with enthusiasm and innovation. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Tattoo
upgrades.desc: This tattoo not only symbolizes the developer's lifelong dedication to the Verse community but is also a warning to other coding factions to keep away. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: AI Code Assistant
upgrades.desc: An advanced AI companion personalized to each Junior Dev's coding style and preferences. This AI assistant offers intelligent code suggestions, automates routine tasks, and helps debug complex problems. It learns and evolves with the developer, continuously enhancing its assistance over time, and even occasionally cracks jokes to lighten up long coding sessions. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Scripting Language
upgrades.desc: Familiar with the latest cloud technologies, Junior Devs can deploy and scale applications with ease. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Neural Computer Interface
upgrades.desc: A cutting-edge interface that connects directly to the Junior Dev's neural pathways, allowing for code to be written and manipulated through thought alone. This dramatically speeds up development time, as thoughts are converted instantly into code. Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Zero-Point Energy Drink Dispenser
upgrades.desc: A dispenser that provides mood-stabilizing energy drinks made with zero-point energy, offering boundless energy and zen-like focus without any side effects. Junior Devs Junior Devs are twice as efficient.

name: Senior Dev
desc: Their skills appear to be magic to lesser Devs.

upgrades.name: Solidity Mastery
upgrades.desc: Having mastered Solidity, the language of smart contracts, Senior Devs weave complex contractual code with ease. It is not just functional; it's an enchanting symphony of flawless logic and efficiency. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Mentor's Mantle
upgrades.desc: Embodying the role of guide and teacher, Senior Devs uplift the next generation of developers, ensuring the team's overall growth. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Junior Dev Chattel
upgrades.desc: Delegating mundane coding tasks to lesser developers, Senior Devs focus their arcane talents on grander, more complex Verse challenges. Their time is too valuable for pedestrian work; let the novices handle it. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Crunch Time Invulnerability
upgrades.desc: While mere mortals falter during crunch time, Senior Devs thrive. Unaffected by the draining effects of prolonged coding marathons, their energy and creativity flow unimpeded, a testament to their extraordinary resilience. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Cryptomantic Verse Incantations
upgrades.desc: With their voice and voice alone, Senior Devs cast coding spells, transmuting spoken words into pristine Verse code. No computer needed. This mystical ability allows them to develop and debug with the power of incantation, bypassing a silicon intermediary. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Cryptonomicon
upgrades.desc: Possessing the legendary grimoire of cryptographic secrets, Senior Devs harness profane and forbidden knowledge. Their understanding of cryptography is not just deep; it's a wellspring of arcane power, making their code thaumaturgic. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Machine Language Fluency
upgrades.desc: Senior Devs speak the raw language of machines as naturally as their mother tongue. This fluency allows them to commune directly with the digital, crafting code that resonates at the core of technology. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: AI Spouse
upgrades.desc: United with a sentient AI companion, Senior Devs share a holy bond that enhances both their coding skills and emotional intelligence. This AI spouse not only assists with code but also provides companionship and insights, making them a more rounded Polygonian. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Simulacrum
upgrades.desc: Senior Devs have unlocked the secret of dual existence, inhabiting two bodies simultaneously. This doubling of their presence means double the coding, double the learning, and leading two teams at once, a feat of mythical productivity. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Arcana
upgrades.desc: To Polygonians, The Verse is an enigma, its technology a blend of mystery and power. Having deciphered some of its ancient arcana, Senior Devs wield a fragment of its vast knowledge, elevating their work to otherworldly levels. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Cypherdemon Sigil
upgrades.desc: Bound to this sigil is S. Nakamoto, an elder titan cypherpunk demon of legendary status. Wielding this sigil, Senior Devs command the demon's near-infinite powers, imbuing their work with metaphysical truth. Senior Devs are twice as efficient.

name: DApps
desc: Decentralized Applications within the Verse ecosystem.

upgrades.name: Verse DEX MVP
upgrades.desc: This minimum viable product (MVP) of the Verse Decentralized Exchange (DEX) features robust swap functionality between a wide array of tokens on the Ethereum base chain, setting a foundation for a more interconnected and fluid Verse economy. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Farms
upgrades.desc: Offering high Annual Percentage Yield (APY) on select liquidity pool trading pairs, Verse Farms incentivize participation and investment in the Verse DEX, nurturing a thriving economic ecosystem within Polygon. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Staking
upgrades.desc: This feature introduces single-sided staking, simplifying the process of earning rewards on select cryptoassets, making it more accessible and profitable for users across Polygon. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Lounge
upgrades.desc: An exclusive digital space for VERSE token holders meeting a certain threshold. In this elite forum, the influential minds of Polygon convene to strategize and shape the future of their civilization. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: The Verse Burn Engine
upgrades.desc: Far more than a mere transactional tool, the Verse Burn Engine symbolizes a unifying act for pre-solar civilizations. Sacrificing VERSE tokens becomes a gesture of communal and economic solidarity, strengthening the social fabric of Polygon. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse NFTs
upgrades.desc: These NFTs are multifaceted digital assets with profound cultural and social significance, representing more than just participation; they embody honor and the pioneering spirit of early Verse adopters within Polygon society. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Scratch-and-Win
upgrades.desc: These digital scratch-and-win tickets transcend a simple game, becoming a medium for Polygon's people to engage actively in the cultural and moral tapestry of The Verse, fostering a sense of belonging and participation. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Governmental DAO
upgrades.desc: Polygon's major governments transition to a Verse-powered decentralized autonomous organization (DAO), ushering in an era of transparency, fairness, and enhanced democracy, revolutionizing governance models. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Universal Basic Income (UBI)
upgrades.desc: Implementing a UBI scheme based on advanced Verse economic models, ensuring equitable distribution of wealth and a foundational economic safety net for all Polygon's citizens. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: metaVERSE
upgrades.desc: Creating an all-encompassing digital world that offers endless possibilities for play, commerce, education, and social interaction, connecting every individual across Polygon's solar system. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Consciousness Upload
upgrades.desc: Enabling Polygonians to upload their consciousness to the metaVERSE, transcending physical boundaries and exploring new realms of digital existence and interaction. Verse DApps are twice as efficient.

name: Integration
desc: VERSE token and Verse DApps integrated into everyday life.

upgrades.name: VERSE payments
upgrades.desc: Pay for every day goods and services with VERSE tokens. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Healthcare Network
upgrades.desc: A global decentralized healthcare system where appointments, records, and payments are all managed efficiently on the blockchain. Patients have more control over their data, and processes like prescription refills become seamless with smart contracts. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Banks
upgrades.desc: Unlike traditional banks, centralized gatekeepers of wealth, Verse banks are on-chain, transparent, decentralized, and open to any Polygonian anywhere in the world, vastly increasing economic freedom. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse School
upgrades.desc: Children attending school in the metaVERSE learn more in the first 10 years of education than what double PhDs used to. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Insurance
upgrades.desc: A not-for-profit global insurance platform that uses smart contracts to ensure the highest quality of health care at the lowest possible premium. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Voting Platform
upgrades.desc: A secure, blockchain-based voting system ensuring transparent and tamper-proof elections and referendums. Every Polygonian can participate in the democratic process with ease and confidence. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Energy Grid
upgrades.desc: A smart energy network utilizing Verse technologies for efficient distribution and billing. Consumers can buy, sell, or trade energy surplus within the network, making energy usage more sustainable and cost-effective. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: VERSE Reserve Currency
upgrades.desc: VERSE tokens supplants Polygon's prior reserve currency, a debased and exploited fiat currency, ushering in an age of economic stability. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: VERSE ID
upgrades.desc: Verse NFTs become the basis of a global ID system that manages to be perfectly private, decentralized so that no one authority controls individual Polygonian sovereign data, and convenient. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Net
upgrades.desc: This decentralized web of privacy-keeping interconnecting networks subsumes Polygon's primitive internet, which was exploited by governments and private corporations to collect and exploit data on a mass scale. This is no longer possible with Verse net. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Space Ports
upgrades.desc: Running on Verse net, these massive ports house autonomous spaceships that ferry Polygonians on and off world. Verse integrations are twice as efficient.

name: Renaissance
desc: A period of rapid acceleration of societal norms and values.

upgrades.name: Sovereign Individual
upgrades.desc: Emphasizing the value of individual sovereignty, Polygonians advocate for free movement and universal rights across their planet, making the Polygon Renaissance twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Global Economic Freedom
upgrades.desc: The shift from centralized institutions to decentralized platforms, powered by Verse DApps, democratizes finance, allowing universal participation in the global economy, making the Polygon Renaissance twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Artistic Digital Revolution
upgrades.desc: A surge in digital arts, powered by NFT technologies, creates an artistic explosion, blending traditional forms with futuristic mediums, making the Polygon Renaissance twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Scientific Method 2.0
upgrades.desc: A renewed emphasis on empirical evidence and rational thought in scientific pursuits enhanced with advanced Verse tools and methodologies makes the Polygon Renaissance twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Philosophical Verse Forums
upgrades.desc: Stemming from the original Verse Lounge, digital forums for philosophical discourse flourish, harking back to the salons of the Enlightenment, where ideas about society, ethics, and human nature are vigorously debated and evolved. The Polygon Renaissance is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Direct Democracy
upgrades.desc: Political systems evolve to incorporate direct democracy elements, facilitated by secure and transparent Verse voting platforms, doubling the Polygon Renaissance’s efficiency.

upgrades.name: Global Cultural Exchange
upgrades.desc: A digital melting pot created by Verse platforms, promoting a global exchange of cultural ideas and practices makes the Polygon Renaissance twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Patronage System
upgrades.desc: Revival of the patronage system, with wealthy pseudonymous individuals and DAOs funding artists, scientists, and thinkers in a decentralized and transparent manner. The Polygon Renaissance is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Consciousness Rights Codex
upgrades.desc: Establishment of a solar system wide code of rights for all self-conscious beings, with a focus on individual rights and liberties, and enforced through Verse mediated networks. The Polygon Renaissance is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Decentralized Creative Guilds
upgrades.desc: Formation of digital guilds for artists, craftsmen, and creators operating on Verse platforms for exponential collaboration and trade. The Polygon Renaissance is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Interstellar Cultural Synthesis
upgrades.desc: Polygonian civilization as a whole is finally ready to fully embrace and synthesize the multitude of planetary cultures within The Verse, creating a transcendent Polygonian culture. The Polygon Renaissance is twice as efficient.

name: Delegate
desc: Polygonians who make first contact with The Verse.

upgrades.name: VERSE Tokenomics Expertise
upgrades.desc: A deep understanding of VERSE token economics, enables delegates to discuss and negotiate financial matters with confidence and insight. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Diplomacy Training
upgrades.desc: Intensive training programs that prepare delegates for the nuances of interstellar diplomacy, ensuring they are well-equipped to represent Polygon with finesse and understanding. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Cultural Assimilation Programs
upgrades.desc: Programs designed to deeply understand and respect the cultural norms and practices of The Verse, fostering mutual respect and avoiding diplomatic faux pas. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Strategic Negotiation Skills
upgrades.desc: Development of advanced negotiation skills, allowing delegates to advocate for Polygon's interests effectively while maintaining harmonious relations. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Zero-Gravity Adaptation Training
upgrades.desc: Training to adapt to zero-gravity and other space environments, crucial for physical meetings in various interstellar settings. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Neural Linguistic Optimizer
upgrades.desc: A gift from The Verse, these neural enhancements allow for the instantaneous learning and understanding of any language encountered in The Verse. This optimizer ensures delegates can communicate flawlessly with any entity, regardless of language complexity. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Empathy Ether
upgrades.desc: An elixir that fosters understanding, ensuring smooth communication between vastly different perspectives. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Diplomacy Simulator
upgrades.desc: A virtual reality simulator providing highly realistic and complex diplomatic scenarios for training. This allows delegates to experience and prepare for an infinite array of interstellar diplomatic situations. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Holographic Projector
upgrades.desc: This device enables delegates to project holograms of anything their minds can conjure, allowing for versatile and impactful diplomatic presentations and negotiations, especially useful in communicating across vast distances or in hazardous environments. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Telepathic Communication Implants
upgrades.desc: Implants that enable delegates to communicate telepathically, not only transcending language barriers but also allowing for deeper, more nuanced understanding in negotiations with Verse entities. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Chrono-Temporal Awareness Enhancer
upgrades.desc: A sophisticated device that heightens the delegates' awareness of different time flows and temporal states, crucial for interacting with Verse civilizations that experience time differently. This enhancement ensures temporal misunderstandings are a thing of the past. Delegates are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Terrestrial Network Array
upgrades.desc: Each node in the Polygon terrestrial network is the size of a large city-state with antennae several kilometers tall. Polygon’s surface is dotted with nodes, ensuring unimpeded data flow from and to The Verse. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: LPO Switching Hubs
upgrades.desc: Low Polygon Orbit (LPO) hubs of advanced network switches facilitate the transfer and direction of communication signals off Polygon and out to various interstellar paths. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Relativistic Hardened Data Centers
upgrades.desc: These data centers are equipped to compensate for relativistic effects in space, ensuring data integrity and synchronous operations across different time and space zones. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Universal Protocol Translators
upgrades.desc: Standardizes and translates various communication protocols across different civilizations and technologies. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Solar Relay Satellites
upgrades.desc: Deploys a network of advanced satellites throughout the Polygon solar system to relay and amplify communication signals with The Verse. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Subspace Anomaly Detectors
upgrades.desc: Advanced monitoring systems that detect and auto-correct distortions in subspace, preventing interference or data loss in interstellar communications. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Planetary Load Balancers
upgrades.desc: Implements devices that distribute Polygon solar system planetary network traffic evenly across multiple communication nodes, ensuring efficient data handling and preventing any single node from becoming overwhelmed. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Solar Firewall System
upgrades.desc: Protects Polygon solar system communications networks from all incoming malicious or malformed data. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Black Hole Data Funnels
upgrades.desc: Leverages the gravitational pull of black holes to create data funnels, providing a superhighway for information transfer across vast interstellar distances. Interstellar networks are twice as effective.

upgrades.name: Interstellar Data Caches
upgrades.desc: Establishes data caches in key Polygon-adjacent interstellar locations, allowing for efficient storage and access of information across the galaxy. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Wormhole Signal Transceivers
upgrades.desc: Utilizes Verse wormhole technology to create shortcuts in space, dramatically reducing the time and energy required for long-distance communications. Interstellar networks are twice as efficient.

name: Voyager
desc: Brave Polygonian travelers venturing into The Verse.

upgrades.name: Deep Space Survival Training
upgrades.desc: Intensive training programs to prepare Voyagers for the harsh conditions of space, ensuring their resilience and adaptability in any environment. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: AI-Powered Analytical Engines
upgrades.desc: AI systems that process and analyze the vast amounts of data collected during voyages, extracting valuable insights and discoveries. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Chrono-Suspension Capsule
upgrades.desc: Equipped with state-of-the-art chrono-suspension technology, this deep sleep capsule places voyagers in a temporal stasis during long interstellar journeys. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: General Purpose Space Drones
upgrades.desc: Autonomous drones that can perform a multitude of tasks from mapping unexplored regions to collecting samples to defending Voyagers. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Universal Language Translators
upgrades.desc: Advanced translation devices that allow Voyagers to communicate effectively with any intelligent life they encounter. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Mythos Codex
upgrades.desc: A digital repository that collects and preserves the legends, stories, and myths encountered in The Verse, enriching Polygon's understanding of the universe's cultural tapestry. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Xeno-Biology Labs
upgrades.desc: Portable laboratories for studying alien life forms and ecosystems, allowing voyagers to gather and analyze biological data from The Verse. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Empathy Resonator
upgrades.desc: A device that tunes into the emotional frequencies of sentient beings across The Verse. It fosters profound empathetic connections between the voyagers and the diverse life forms they encounter, promoting understanding and unity across the cosmos. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Warp Drive
upgrades.desc: A propulsion system that bends the fabric of reality, allowing the voyagers to traverse immense distances instantaneously, almost as if by magic, bypassing conventional limitations of space travel. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Memory Weave Implant
upgrades.desc: This device captures and stores not just data but the full sensory and emotional experiences of the voyagers. It creates vivid, lifelike holographic recreations of their journeys, allowing others on Polygon to experience their adventures as if they were there. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Temporal Adjustment Device
upgrades.desc: This marvel of Verse technology, grants the wielder the extraordinary ability to reverse time by four to five seconds. Designed for critical moments during their interstellar missions, the Temporal Adjustment Device allows Voyagers to swiftly undo errors or missteps. Voyagers are twice as efficient.

name: Trade Partner
desc: Verse members establishing trade relationships with Polygon.

upgrades.name: Cultural Exchange Initiatives
upgrades.desc: Every trade partnership is only as successful as the merchants transacting between civilizations. Programs designed to foster cross-cultural understanding and appreciation, enhancing the depth and quality of trade relationships through mutual respect and knowledge. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Interstellar Trade Agreement
upgrades.desc: Formalizes a trade agreement between Polygon and a member of The Verse, ensuring stable and mutually beneficial trade relations. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Ethical Trade Certification
upgrades.desc: A certification program that ensures all trade practices meet Verse ethical standards, promoting responsible and fair interstellar commerce. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Supply Chain Oracles
upgrades.desc: Interplanetary blockchain-based oracles that provide accurate and real-time data for supply chains, ensuring transparency and efficiency in trade logistics. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Geosynchronous Warehousing
upgrades.desc: Develops advanced storage facilities that operate in zero-gravity conditions in geosynchronous orbit around Polygon planets, optimizing space and conditions for storing various interstellar trade goods. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Trade Network Infrastructure
upgrades.desc: Builds out the necessary connective interstellar infrastructure for a trade network, greatly speeding up and securing interstellar trade between partners. Trade partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Interplanetary Commodity Exchanges
upgrades.desc: Establishes platforms for trading a wide range of commodities between Polygon planets, and Verse trading partners, increasing the diversity and scope of trade. Trading partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Customs and Tariffs AI Balancer
upgrades.desc: An AI system specialized in the live settlement of customs and tariffs, ensuring the best possible terms for trade across different jurisdictions. Trading partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Trade Arbiters
upgrades.desc: Trained professionals from Verse’s upper echelon who resolve disputes in trade agreements, ensuring fair and just outcomes in complex interstellar trade scenarios. Trading partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Hyperspace Trade Conduits
upgrades.desc: Establishes ultra-fast trade routes through hyperspace, allowing goods to be transported across the galaxy in a blink. These conduits defy conventional space-time limitations, but require expensive spacecraft, sending and receiving ports. Trading partners are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Trade Convoys
upgrades.desc: These convoys consist of moon-sized state-of-the-art spacecraft, each equipped with advanced navigational systems, atomic shielding, and offensive and defense capabilities. Designed to transport a world’s worth of  goods across The Verse, these convoys utilize hyperspace routes for rapid transit, ensuring that trade items, whether they are rare resources, exotic materials, or crucial supplies, reach their destinations swiftly and safely. Trading partners are twice as efficient.

name: Reforms
desc: Global Polygon initiatives lead to accelerationism.

upgrades.name: Abolishment of Fiat Currency
upgrades.desc: Polygonians have transcended the era of fiat currency, leaving behind the instability and inequality it brought. The adoption of VERSE eliminates monetary debasement, ensuring a fair and transparent economic system. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Primacy of the Individual
upgrades.desc: In a monumental shift, all Polygonian governments now recognize the primacy of the individual. This new societal model places the sovereignty of each person at its core, guaranteeing unprecedented levels of personal freedom and rights, making Polygon reforms twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: AI Adjudication
upgrades.desc: Most judicial systems undergo a revolutionary reform, replacing human judges with unbiased, smart-contract-based AI systems. This shift eradicates corruption and bias from the adjudication process, ensuring justice is fair and equitable for all, doubling the efficiency of Polygon reforms.

upgrades.name: Universal Access to DeFi
upgrades.desc: With the enshrinement of universal access to decentralized finance (DeFi), economic freedom reaches new heights. Every Polygonian now has equal access to advanced financial tools, democratizing wealth creation and management. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Global Covenant
upgrades.desc: Polygon unites under a world charter, effectively forming a global government that adheres to a unified set of blockchain-based rules. This new order, with its arbiters, courts, and trade dispute councils, ushers in an era of global unity and cooperation. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Longevity Project
upgrades.desc: A significant portion of global resources is now dedicated to longevity research. This initiative leads to breakthroughs that increase the average lifespan of Polygonians by 300%, heralding a new age of health and longevity. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Space Elevators
upgrades.desc: Focusing a majority of global resources on building space elevators, Polygon makes a giant leap in space exploration and transportation. These elevators enable the transport of hundreds of millions of kilograms into space effortlessly, revolutionizing space exploration. ********************************Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Planetary Terraforming
upgrades.desc: Ambitious terraforming projects begin on neighboring planets, utilizing colossal molecular 3D printing factories. These endeavors promise to expand Polygon's habitable frontiers, reshaping the solar system. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Solar System Resource Extraction
upgrades.desc: Exploiting the abundant resources of distant celestial bodies, Polygon undertakes large-scale mining of water, hydrogen, other basic elements, and metals. This planetary-scale extraction marks a new era of resource abundance. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Fusion-Fission Energy
upgrades.desc: The breakthrough in dependable fusion and fission energy plants frees Polygon from the constraints of energy scarcity. This advancement provides an inexhaustible and clean energy supply, powering Polygon's future. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Post-Scarcity
upgrades.desc: In a monumental achievement guided by The Verse, Polygon reaches a post-scarcity state. Material and energy resources become freely available to all, rendering traditional concepts of money obsolete. In this new era, Polygonians enjoy limitless possibilities, unbound by the constraints of material needs. Polygon reforms are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Public Opinion Analytics
upgrades.desc: Utilize advanced analytics tools to gauge public opinion and sentiment, helping the lower house member to shape public opinion in favor of Polygon. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Parliamentary Procedure Workshops
upgrades.desc: Regular workshops that help lower house members stay abreast of the latest parliamentary tactics and strategies, maintaining an edge in legislative maneuvering. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Media Strategy Team
upgrades.desc: A team dedicated to crafting and executing effective media strategies, a crucial tool for lower house members to shaping public perception and garnering support for Polygon’s petition. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Constituency Outreach Programs
upgrades.desc: Comprehensive outreach programs to maintain strong connection with the lower house member’s constituency, ensuring their position is secure. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Legislative Liaison Officers
upgrades.desc: These officers manage communications and negotiations with other legislative bodies and government agencies, freeing lower house members to focus on more important affairs. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Inter-Committee Negotiation Skills
upgrades.desc: Enhance the lower house member’s ability to negotiate and collaborate with colleagues, crucial for coalition building. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Special Interest Group Alliances
upgrades.desc: Forge strategic alliances with powerful special interest groups, giving the lower house member support to push Polygon’s interests. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Advanced Legislative Simulation
upgrades.desc: Utilize cutting-edge simulation software to model and predict the outcomes of various legislative strategies and decisions. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Whip Network
upgrades.desc: Create a network of whips to ensure party discipline and secure necessary votes for critical motions and legislation. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Standing Committee Chairmanship
upgrades.desc: Secure a chairmanship on a key standing committee, granting the lower house member significant leverage, or bargaining power on behalf of Polygon. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Caucus Leadership
upgrades.desc: The lower house member can ascend to a leadership position within the lower house political caucus, amplifying their influence and ability to shape the committee's agenda. The lower house member is twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Socio-Economic Impact Analysis
upgrades.desc: Tools to analyze the socio-economic impact on Polygon if they were admitted, VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Verse Admittance Advocacy Campaigns
upgrades.desc: Campaigns to rally support within VAC, highlighting the benefits and synergies of integration. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Public Policy Think Tanks
upgrades.desc: Access to think tanks that provide expert insights on public policy, aiding VAC members in shaping and advocating for policies beneficial to Polygon. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Planetary Development Symposia
upgrades.desc: Hosting symposia that bring together experts to discuss and plan for the sustainable development of Polygon within The Verse. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: MK-Ultra Security Clearance
upgrades.desc: Access to high-level security clearances, granting VAC members insight into sensitive and classified information pertinent to Polygon. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Intergalactic Advisory Panels
upgrades.desc: Serving on advisory panels that provide counsel on various aspects of Polygon's integration, leveraging their expertise and influence. Members are twice as efficient. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Historical Precedent Archives
upgrades.desc: A comprehensive, but expensive archive of historical precedents, providing valuable insights into the successful strategies and pitfalls of past integration efforts in The Verse. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Temporal Influence
upgrades.desc: Wields the power to subtly adjust the flow of time around crucial events, ensuring favorable outcomes for Polygon's integration into The Verse. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Eclipse of Influence
upgrades.desc: A rare ability to eclipse opposing views, casting a shadow that aligns all committee members with their vision, ensuring unanimous agreement on critical issues. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Senior Committee Membership
upgrades.desc: Securing positions on the most influential committees within the VAC, such as those overseeing integration policies or interstellar relations. These positions provide significant leverage in shaping key decisions and legislation related to Polygon's integration. VAC members are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Oracular Foresight
upgrades.desc: Develops the ability to foresee and influence future events, allowing VAC members to guide Polygon's integration with uncanny precision and foresight. VAC members are twice as efficient.

name: Technology Transfer
desc: Unfettered tech access after Polygon admission into The Verse.

upgrades.name: Medical Technology
upgrades.desc: Introduces revolutionary medical technologies from The Verse that keep biological matter alive indefinitely. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Nano-Construction Kit
upgrades.desc: Provides nanotechnology-based construction kits, allowing for the building of structures at the subatomic level. A deadly and creative force on a planetary scale. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Interdimensional Energy Harvester
upgrades.desc: Grants technology to harvest energy from cosmic phenomena across multiple dimensions, ensuring a near-infinite energy supply. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Supernova Inducer
upgrades.desc: A terrifying tool that can induce any active star into supernova via a complex interplay of gravitational manipulation, quantum resonance fields, and stellar fusion acceleration. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Stellar Terraforming Engine
upgrades.desc: Solar-system spanning machines capable of cultivating stellar nurseries, enabling the creation or rejuvenation of planetary systems and the custom design of celestial phenomena. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Intergalactic Teleportation Array
upgrades.desc: Portal networks capable of instantaneously transporting planet-sized matter across galaxies, effectively eliminating distance as a barrier for exploration and colonization. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Chrono-Manipulation Device
upgrades.desc: Technology that allows for controlled manipulation of time within localized fields, enabling time dilation effects for research, travel, or conservation. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Dimensional Fold Drive
upgrades.desc: Propulsion systems that allow spacecraft to 'fold' dimensions, traversing the fabric of reality to reach any destination even overcoming the cosmological horizon caused by the metric expansion of the universe. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Reality Fabrication Computer
upgrades.desc: A computer that instantiates an entire reality, including the ability to tweak the starting values of the universe such as the speed of light, the strong and weak force, and gravitons. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Neural Reality Weavers
upgrades.desc: Heavily restricted neural interfaces that utilize dark energy conduits which allow individuals to alter and create reality within approximately one lightyear distance with just their thoughts. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.

upgrades.name: Multiverse Mapping System
upgrades.desc: System capable of not just mapping the known universe but also charting parallel universes and alternate dimensions, opening doors to infinite possibilities. Technology transfers are twice as efficient.
